revised_title: A Discussion on the Floor of the Atlantic Ocean: Sediments and Structure
tldr: This article discusses a discussion held on the floor of the Atlantic Ocean, focusing on the sediments and structure. It covers topics such as sedimentation rates, turbidity currents, seismic work, and the differences between ocean and continental structures. The authors explore the advancements in deep-sea sedimentology and the techniques used to study the ocean floor.
